Code Size.
拆拆\sf{SLAPP}s TCB was implemented in C and compiled using the O3 optimization flag.
Details of code size and the resulting binaries are shown in TableI.
As 拆拆subscript拆拆\sf{SLAPP}_{SK} relies on an inexpensive cryptographic primitive, it exhibits the smallest code size.
Conversely, 拆subscript拆\sf{SLAPP}_{PQ} results in the largest number of lines of C code. However, the O3 optimization was capable of reducing its binary size, making it comparable to that of 拆subscript拆\sf{SLAPP}_{PK}.
Compared to the baseline, 拆拆\sf{SLAPP} introduces a small code size overhead, approximately 6% for 拆拆subscript拆拆\sf{SLAPP}_{SK} and 2% for the others.

During normal (benign) operation, 扁筐别\sf{\mathcal{V}rf} and \sf{\mathcal{P}rv} execute an instance of LDP-DC+ protocol.
This instance begins with the Setup phase, which requires 拆佛拆\sf{PoSX} of Init-State function to initialize a \sf{\mathcal{P}rv}-local state (PRRPRR mapping) to zeroes.
Since \sf{\mathcal{P}rv} faithfully executes this phase, it completes with top\top.
Upon obtaining the successful output, 扁筐别\sf{\mathcal{V}rf} proceeds to the Collect phase, which aims to collect authentic noisy energy data from \sf{\mathcal{P}rv}.
To achieve this, 扁筐别\sf{\mathcal{V}rf} crafts a 拆佛拆\sf{PoSX} request by configuring a function to prove execution to LDP-DC and properly selecting LDP input parameters (i.e., ff, pp and qq) to meet the 系italic-系\epsilon-LDP requirement, and sends an authenticated 拆佛拆\sf{PoSX} request to \sf{\mathcal{P}rv}.
Adhering to the protocol, \sf{\mathcal{P}rv} executes LDP-DC correctly (with 扁筐别\sf{\mathcal{V}rf}-defined inputs) and returns authentic noisy energy data to 扁筐别\sf{\mathcal{V}rf}.
As a result, this phase completes with top\top ensuring 扁筐别\sf{\mathcal{V}rf} that the received energy data is not poisoned.
End-to-end runtime and memory usage during this operation are shown in TableII.

During benign operation, \sf{\mathcal{P}rv} and 扁筐别\sf{\mathcal{V}rf} initiate FL-DC+ protocol by running Setup phase, which clears all sensor readings on \sf{\mathcal{P}rv}.
Next, 扁筐别\sf{\mathcal{V}rf} periodically triggers Collect phase to record an energy reading into a \sf{\mathcal{P}rv}-local training dataset.
Once \sf{\mathcal{P}rv} records enough energy readings, 扁筐别\sf{\mathcal{V}rf} triggers the Train phase by transmitting a 拆佛拆\sf{PoSX} request to \sf{\mathcal{P}rv}. This request specifies initial weights to be trained on, a learning rate, and the number of epochs to be 100. \sf{\mathcal{P}rv} then performs the local training.
Upon completion, \sf{\mathcal{P}rv} sends back the updated weights along with the proof of training to 扁筐别\sf{\mathcal{V}rf}.
Since 扁筐别\sf{\mathcal{V}rf} and \sf{\mathcal{P}rv} adhere to FL-DC+, the protocol yields top\top, ensuring to 扁筐别\sf{\mathcal{V}rf} that the received model was correctly trained on authentic energy data and can thus be safely aggregated onto the global model.
Runtime breakdown and memory usage are shown in TableII.
